name: RLASER
description:
RLASER

In 2050 B.C.....

A legendary battle is about to come... 

The long peace is about to end...

Here's captain speaking. The peace treaty between Earth and XL Planet is no longer valid; and aliens are coming to take over us!!!

Soldiers, it's now our responsibility to protect our families!!! Defend the earth from alien attacks!!!! 

Choose your favorite ship before going to space. Attention, soldiers! Each ship has different firing rates, health, and projectile damage. Select the one that best serves! Again, choose your ship wisely!!!

Move left and right by pressing the left and right arrow keys. Press space bar to shoot out lasers!!! Don't get shot too many times!!! Be attentive to the health bar on the top left side!!

Captain speaking again... As you progress through each wave, aliens' health
will increase gradually. GET THROUGH ALL FIVE WAVES TO WIN!!! AHHHHHH....

Stupid human beings, let's battle now!!!!!!
